welcome_message_body: Welcome to Damascus, the ancient city where history comes to life. Explore the charming streets, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage that make this city a truly unforgettable destination. Enjoy your time here and make the most of your visit to Damascus.

restaurants.name: Dean's Homestyle Cafe
restaurants.description: Dean's Homestyle Cafe is a breakfast spot located in Damascus.

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in Clackamas.

restaurants.description: Soy Grill is a asian restaurant located in Clackamas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Damascus International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Damascus International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
